description: Handcrafted in Aku's Montebelluna, Italy factory the Men's Tribute II LTR has a beautiful full grain leather upper with a full grain leather liner that is buttery soft and highly breathable. Match this with an injected polyurethane midsole and a Vibram rubber outsole and the Tribute II LTR will take you on any adventure.
name: Aku Tribute II LTR - Mens

specs.value: The 2MM Premium Italian leather exterior provides protection across rugged terrain
